Her husband, Martin, cares for her but is frustrated by her physical withdrawal. Her younger brother, Minus, is confused by Karin's vulnerability and his own budding sexuality. Their father, David, cannot overcome his haughty remoteness. Beset by visions, Karin descends further into madness.","poster_path":"/rYD30Fm4vAcBqk1kTsxHw1s8P29.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"sv","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":12.119,"release_date":"1961-10-16","video":false,"vote_average":7.79,"vote_count":465},{"backdrop_path":"/lQMr8CwStJtFAtZmZFvBwnRxBE4.jpg","id":104251,"title":"Pastoral: To Die in the Country","original_title":"田園に死す","overview":"A director faces creative block while working on his latest film - a reimagination of his adolescence growing up in a mountain village in rural Japan.","poster_path":"/8WiNgQeYBAh9fOsPCRjQdBSnoEk.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[14,18],"popularity":15.422,"release_date":"1974-12-28","video":false,"vote_average":7.5,"vote_count":93},{"backdrop_path":"/mPCq7QCpqNb8hMTOyL0Plq7AVZR.jpg","id":42602,"title":"The Passion of Anna","original_title":"En passion","overview":"Andreas, a man struggling with the recent demise of his marriage and his own emotional isolation, befriends a married couple also in the midst of psychological turmoil. In turn he meets Anna, who is grieving the recent deaths of her husband and son. She appears zealous in her faith and steadfast in her search for truth, but gradually her delusions surface. Andreas and Anna pursue a love affair, but he is unable to overcome his feelings of deep humiliation and remains disconnected. Meanwhile, the island community is victimized by an unknown person committing acts of animal cruelty.","poster_path":"/cr01316AyxUZyZrdLwzz3AXrgJc.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"sv","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":15.091,"release_date":"1969-11-10","video":false,"vote_average":7.5,"vote_count":168},{"backdrop_path":"/nc6uHR9QRzhAUIB6q8tDGzBAsx4.jpg","id":11656,"title":"The Virgin Spring","original_title":"Jungfrukällan","overview":"Devout Christians Töre and Märeta send their only daughter, the virginal Karin, and their foster daughter, the unrepentant Ingeri, to deliver candles to a distant church.
